register.description: The Global Event Mapping register controls the egress global event index for this event count. Offset =0h + (j * 20h); where j = 0h to 1FFh for NAVSS0_UDMASS_INTA0_CFG_GCNTCFG j = 0h to FFh for MCU_NAVSS0_UDMASS_INTA0_CFG_GCNTCFG

bitfield.description: Global event index. This field specifies the index of the outgoing global event. Set to 0xFFFF to disable.
